Reviews.Title: Fugifilm T550 camera
Reviews.Author: S. Cleveland
Reviews.Content: Was surprised at all of the features this little camera has for the cost. I have two other Fujifilm cameras and find them to be very good for what I use them for. One thing is you don't go broke buying them.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was seeking
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Brownell
Reviews.Content: Although only a point and shoot, the camera has lots of options and the lag time is the much less than other point and shoot cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Tessa Beam
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my mom as a present. She was in desperate need for an updated camera. This was quick and easy for her to learn to use. The quality of the pictures is amazing!

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Jerome
Reviews.Content: Well after having two others that ended up in deep water, I have 3 batteries to go along with the new camera.  It was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Be Honest!
Reviews.Author: Scenic Terrace Owners Assoc.
Reviews.Content: It would have been helpful for the seller to make clear that this camera requires a memory card which must be purchased separately. That's not an accessory, folks, it's mandatory if you want to take even one picture.

Reviews.Title: fun camera but blurry telephoto
Reviews.Author: Bill Jones
Reviews.Content: I had a Fuji T200, which took great telephoto pictures but sometimes did not autofocus and the screen was dim in the sun.  The T550 has good AF and bright screen, and pretty quick turn-on and shot-to-shot times  -- no complaints about the operation.  But the long telephoto was blurred (even when camera was on a base).

Reviews.Title: Sending it back
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: Almost all my pictures come out blurry. Either totally blurry or just blurry to one side. I have tried everything Fuji suggests on their technical support site. The size of this camera is great, but I need something that will take a decent picture.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for novice
Reviews.Author: S. chen
Reviews.Content: Good packing and fast delivery. For 16m pixel, 12xzoom and a lot of choices for pointing and shooting, this camera is cheaper and has good quality, but there is no manual option.

ProductInfo.Features:
16MP 1/2.3" CCD Sensor
Fujinon 12x Optical Zoom Lens
35mm Equivalent Focal Length: 24-288mm
3.0" 460k-Dot LCD Monitor
HD 1280 x 720 Video at 30fps
ISO 100-3200
Optical Image Stabilizer
Advanced Filter and SR AUTO Mode
Face, Blink, and Smile Detection
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix T550 16MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (Silver)
